SELECT M.* FROM T_MATERIAL M LEFT JOIN S_NEW_PROCESS N ON M.MATERIAL_ID = N.TRADING_ID LEFT JOIN T_CATALOG_MATERIAL C ON M.MATERIAL_ID = C.MATERIAL_ID LEFT JOIN T_CATALOG T ON C.CATALOG_ID = T.CATALOG_ID WHERE N.STATUS = '20' AND N.ACTIVE = '1' AND N.TRADING_TYPE = 'T_MATERIAL' AND T.CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId} AND M.DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType} AND M.EXPIR_TIME >= CURDATE()
AND M.ORG_ID = #{orgId}
AND M.MATERIAL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%','${materialName}','%' )
ORDER BY M.FORCE_PLAY
